headline.main: Premier Tells People to Prepare; Portuguese Weighing War Entry; Be Ready, Premier Warns Nation

lead_paragraph: LISBON, Sept. 2 (AP) -- Premier Antonio de Oliveira Salazar stated today that Portugal's stepped-up military preparations were defensive but "in the unfortunate times in which we are living may have to be used against foreign enemies as much as against internal elements of national disintegration."
abstract: Portuguese war declaration on Japan in protest against Jap atrocities, Portuguese Timor, held imminent; '42 Jap Timor conquest revd
